title: [Bug] TodoApp.list() method name shadows Python built-in list() function
summary: Renamed TodoApp.list() method to list_todos() to avoid shadowing Python's built-in list() function.
risks: The list() method was renamed to list_todos(), which is a breaking change for any external consumers of this API. However, the TodoApp class appears to be internal to this project.
verification_steps: All call sites of app.list() were updated to app.list_todos() in cli.py and test files
New regression test file added to verify list_todos() works correctly
All 117 tests pass with the changes
